entities.name: the phoenix
entities.description: The Phoenix is mentioned as a symbol of the past, and it's implied that it has huge numbers at its command.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who follow Voldemort, and they're mentioned as being bullied or bewitched into following him.

entities.name: giants
entities.description: Giants are mentioned as one of the groups that Voldemort is trying to recruit.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as an organization that is not believing in Voldemort's return.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist and is mentioned throughout the conversation.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who is trying to stop Voldemort from getting more followers.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a person who is trying to convince people that Voldemort has returned.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who is explaining why the Ministry of Magic is not believing in Voldemort's return.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is a person who is refusing to believe that Voldemort has returned.

relationships.description: Voldemort has followers, specifically the Death Eaters.
Bill is trying to convince people that Voldemort has returned.
Tonks mentions the Ministry's attitude towards Voldemort's return.
Cornelius Fudge refuses to believe that Voldemort has returned.
